name: Happy world with happy colors
description:
This is currently a unity template c:, you're in a happy world racing in pink colors and weird stuff <3 Enjoy ( PLEASE PRESS ESC WHEN YOU JUST OPENED THE GAME FOR MENU ) Tought, this game can be bad and glitchy or laggy, it would be because of the color brightness and shading stuff, if this game cannot be played on your pc i dont have any idea of how to fix that, i guess you will buy a new one in the short amount of your life c:

Also, this game is for windows, any windows i guess like 7,8,10 

Credits:

Lakim (Song)

Unity (Template)
